infoA.title: Members
infoA.description: We focus on supplying travel insurance service between China and Ireland. The number of users is growing rapidly.

infoB.title: Scope
infoB.description: Provide different levels and scope of insurance services, to give you the most intimate service.

infoC.title: Secure
infoC.description: We provide the best insurance service to protect you and your family.

form.hint: To protect your rights and interests, please read carefully
form.login: Already have an account? Click to log in

form.signup: No account yet? Click to register

homePage.ad: May the luggage be with you

features.title: Your life will be much easier

1.title: 1 System = 2 Work Models
1.2: Different log-in channel for clients and employees.
1.3: The client cannot log into the employee page, so as employee.

2.title: Quick & Comprehend
2.1: The new user needs to create an account.
2.2: The system will check whether the username exists, and the password meets the requirement.

3.title: Exclusive Information Management, No Third-Party Sharing
3.1: After sign up a new account, the user will be asked to fill in the profile information.
3.2: The profile information will used in the later claim process.

4.title: Information Updating at Any Time
4.1: The information in profile can be modified by the user.
4.2: The system will check the user’s inputs, and update to the latest profile.

5.title: Cellphone Verification Guarantee
5.1: If the user forgets the password, he or she can input the phone number in the profile.
5.2: The server will send a verification code to that phone, and the user can use it to set a new password.

6.title: Global Common System
6.1: The system is designed into two languages: English and Chinese.
6.2: This is convenient for users in different countries, and meets the international requirements.

pricing.title: Pick the best plan for you
pricing.content: You can choose whatever suits you best

1.title: Basic
1.content: Travel on three of the most common models of transport, train, plane, and long-distance bus.

2.title: Medium
2.content: Loss of your luggage in the event of natural and man-made disasters

3.title: Premium
3.content: Travel by train, plane, coach, taxi or steamship.

profilePage.title: Personal Profile
profilePage.tips: To purchase insurance services, you need to fill in your personal information. Please fill in your personal information and save and modify it

claimProcessPage.title: File Claim
claimProcessPage.skip: Back to insurances page in 2 seconds

type1.title: Accident Type 1
type1.description: The vehicle suffered from rainstorm, lightning and other natural disasters

type2.title: Accident Type 2
type2.description: The vehicle encountered fire, explosion, collision or overturn

type3.title: Accident Type 3
type3.description: Fire, explosion, collision or capsizing of a vehicle, theft, robbery, loss of luggage

filelist1.1: The personal ID of the insured
filelist1.2: Certified documents of the travel of the insured
filelist1.3: The driver license of the insured
filelist1.7: Car rental company's loss amount and maintenance fee list
filelist1.9: Rental vehicle collision insurance or stolen insurance policy(If necessary)
filelist1.10: Valid proof of rental vehicles(If necessary)

filelist2.1: Original proof of delay issued by the carrier, indicating the time and reason for the delay

filelist3.1: Local police original record( must alarm within 24 hours of the accident
filelist3.2: Original written certificates of hotel, carrier and other relevant department
filelist3.3: Loss list and invoice(specify the date and amount of purchase in detai)
filelist3.4: Proof of source of cash and cheque
filelist3.5: Reset the invoice for passport and travel documents or original receipt
filelist3.6: Invoice for travel and accommodation expenses for additional expenses or original receipt

auth.Password is not same with confirm passwo: Password is not same with confirm password
